name: Nathaniel Rateliff
description: '''Nathaniel David Rateliff''' (born October 7, 1978) is an American singer and songwriter based in [[Denver]], [[Colorado]], whose influences are described as [[folk music|folk]], [[Americana (music)|Americana]] and vintage [[rhythm & blues]]. Rateliff has performed with a backing band called the Night Sweats for an R&B side project he formed in 2013. He has released three solo albums, two solo EPs, and one album as Nathaniel Rateliff & the Wheel.
